Mobile Application Authoring Issues

How to author a single page application?

  • Phonegap applications are by nature single page applications
  • Most applications use a UI framework to hide groups of elements acting as screens
  • Example: jQueryMobile uses 'div' tags to represent pages within a single page application
  • Authoring one large page is cumbersome and gives no visualization to the application
  • Applications screens should be authored as close to the layout as possible
  • In AEM Apps Angular JS is used to allow a multiple page authoring experience while still building a single page application
